This class should handle sending delay data to a server, with proper error handling, simulation mode for testing, and connection management as mentioned in the postconditions (SMOS server).

```java
import java.util.List;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.io.*;
import java.net.*;
import java.time.LocalDateTime;
import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
import javax.swing.JOptionPane;

/**
 * DataHandler class responsible for server communication.
 * Handles sending delay data to the server with error handling and retry logic.
 * Supports simulation mode for testing without actual server connection.
 */
public class DataHandler {
    // Configuration constants
    private static final String DEFAULT_SERVER_URL = "http://localhost:8080/api/delays";
    private static final int CONNECTION_TIMEOUT = 10000; // 10 seconds
    private static final int READ_TIMEOUT = 15000; // 15 seconds
    private static final int MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS = 3;
    
    // File constants for data persistence
    private static final String DATA_DIR = "ata_delay_data";
    private static final String BACKUP_FILE_FORMAT = "yyyyMMdd_HHmmss";
    
    private String serverUrl;
    private boolean simulationMode;
    private String currentStaffName;
    private List<DelayEntry> pendingEntries;
    
    // Logging and status
    private StringBuilder operationLog;
    
    /**
     * Constructor with default server URL
     * @param staffName Name of the ATA staff using the system
     */
    public DataHandler(String staffName) {
        this(DEFAULT_SERVER_URL, staffName);
    }
    
    /**
     * Constructor with custom server URL
     * @param serverUrl The URL of the server endpoint
     * @param staffName Name of the ATA staff using the system
     */
    public DataHandler(String serverUrl, String staffName) {
        this.serverUrl = serverUrl;
        this.currentStaffName = staffName;
        this.simulationMode = false;
        this.pendingEntries = new ArrayList<>();
        this.operationLog = new StringBuilder();
        
        log("DataHandler initialized for staff: " + staffName);
        log("Server URL: " + serverUrl);
    }
    
    /**
     * Enable or disable simulation mode
     * @param simulationMode True for simulation mode, false for real server communication
     */
    public void setSimulationMode(boolean simulationMode) {
        this.simulationMode = simulationMode;
        log("Simulation mode: " + (simulationMode ? "ENABLED" : "DISABLED"));
    }
    
    /**
     * Send delay data to the server
     * @param delayEntries List of delay entries to send
     * @return True if successful, false otherwise
     */
    public boolean sendDelayData(List<DelayEntry> delayEntries) {
        if (delayEntries == null || delayEntries.isEmpty()) {
            log("No delay entries to send");
            return false;
        }
        
        log("Preparing to send " + delayEntries.size() + " delay entries");
        
        // Validate all entries before sending
        String validationError = validateDelayEntries(delayEntries);
        if (validationError != null) {
            log("Validation failed: " + validationError);
            return false;
        }
        
        // Store pending entries
        pendingEntries = new ArrayList<>(delayEntries);
        
        // Check for simulation mode
        if (simulationMode) {
            return simulateServerSubmission(delayEntries);
        }
        
        // Real server communication
        return sendToServer(delayEntries);
    }
    
    /**
     * Send data to the actual server with retry logic
     * @param delayEntries List of delay entries
     * @return True if successful, false otherwise
     */
    private boolean sendToServer(List<DelayEntry> delayEntries) {
        log("Attempting to connect to server: " + serverUrl);
        
        // Try multiple times in case of connection issues
        for (int attempt = 1; attempt <= MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS; attempt++) {
            try {
                log("Connection attempt " + attempt + " of " + MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS);
                
                // Create HTTP connection
                URL url = new URL(serverUrl);
                HttpURLConnection connection = (HttpURLConnection) url.openConnection();
                
                // Configure connection
                connection.setRequestMethod("POST");
                connection.setRequestProperty("Content-Type", "application/json");
                connection.setRequestProperty("Accept", "application/json");
                connection.setRequestProperty("User-Agent", "ATA-Delay-System/1.0");
                connection.setConnectTimeout(CONNECTION_TIMEOUT);
                connection.setReadTimeout(READ_TIMEOUT);
                connection.setDoOutput(true);
                
                // Create JSON payload
                String jsonPayload = createJsonPayload(delayEntries);
                log("Payload size: " + jsonPayload.length() + " bytes");
                
                // Send data
                try (OutputStream os = connection.getOutputStream()) {
                    byte[] input = jsonPayload.getBytes("utf-8");
                    os.write(input, 0, input.length);
                }
                
                // Get response
                int responseCode = connection.getResponseCode();
                log("Server response code: " + responseCode);
                
                // Read response
                StringBuilder response = new StringBuilder();
                try (BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(
                        new InputStreamReader(connection.getInputStream(), "utf-8"))) {
                    String responseLine;
                    while ((responseLine = br.readLine()) != null) {
                        response.append(responseLine.trim());
                    }
                }
                
                // Handle response
                if (responseCode == HttpURLConnection.HTTP_OK || 
                    responseCode == HttpURLConnection.HTTP_CREATED) {
                    log("Server accepted data successfully");
                    log("Response: " + response.toString());
                    
                    // Clear pending entries on success
                    pendingEntries.clear();
                    createBackupFile(delayEntries, true);
                    return true;
                } else {
                    log("Server rejected data with code: " + responseCode);
                    log("Error response: " + response.toString());
                    
                    // Save to backup file for retry
                    createBackupFile(delayEntries, false);
                    
                    // Wait before retry (exponential backoff)
                    if (attempt < MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS) {
                        int waitTime = 1000 * (int) Math.pow(2, attempt - 1); // 1s, 2s, 4s
                        log("Waiting " + waitTime + "ms before retry...");
                        Thread.sleep(waitTime);
                    }
                }
                
                connection.disconnect();
                
            } catch (SocketTimeoutException e) {
                log("Connection timeout on attempt " + attempt + ": " + e.getMessage());
                createBackupFile(delayEntries, false);
                
                if (attempt == MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS) {
                    log("Max retry attempts reached. Data saved to backup.");
                    showConnectionError("Connection timeout. Data saved locally for later submission.");
                }
                
            } catch (ConnectException e) {
                log("Connection refused on attempt " + attempt + ": " + e.getMessage());
                createBackupFile(delayEntries, false);
                
                if (attempt == MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS) {
                    log("Max retry attempts reached. SMOS server connection interrupted.");
                    showConnectionError("SMOS server connection interrupted. Data saved locally.");
                    
                    // SMOS server interruption as per postconditions
                    handleSMOSServerInterruption();
                }
                
            } catch (IOException e) {
                log("IO error on attempt " + attempt + ": " + e.getMessage());
                createBackupFile(delayEntries, false);
                
                if (attempt == MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS) {
                    log("Max retry attempts reached due to IO error.");
                    showConnectionError("Network error. Please check your connection.");
                }
                
            } catch (Exception e) {
                log("Unexpected error on attempt " + attempt + ": " + e.getMessage());
                e.printStackTrace();
                createBackupFile(delayEntries, false);
                
                if (attempt == MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS) {
                    log("Max retry attempts reached due to unexpected error.");
                    showConnectionError("Unexpected error occurred: " + e.getMessage());
                }
            }
        }
        
        return false;
    }
    
    /**
     * Simulate server submission (for testing without actual server)
     * @param delayEntries List of delay entries
     * @return Always returns true for simulation
     */
    private boolean simulateServerSubmission(List<DelayEntry> delayEntries) {
        log("SIMULATION MODE: Simulating server submission");
        
        try {
            // Simulate network delay
            Thread.sleep(1500);
            
            // Validate in simulation
            String validationError = validateDelayEntries(delayEntries);
            if (validationError != null) {
                log("SIMULATION: Validation failed - " + validationError);
                return false;
            }
            
            // Create backup file even in simulation
            createBackupFile(delayEntries, true);
            
            // Log simulated success
            log("SIMULATION: Successfully submitted " + delayEntries.size() + " entries");
            for (DelayEntry entry : delayEntries) {
                log("SIMULATION: " + entry.getSummary());
            }
            
            // Clear pending entries
            pendingEntries.clear();
            
            return true;
            
        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
            Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
            log("SIMULATION: Interrupted during simulation");
            return false;
        } catch (Exception e) {
            log("SIMULATION: Error during simulation - " + e.getMessage());
            return false;
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * Validate a list of delay entries
     * @param delayEntries List of delay entries to validate
     * @return Error message if validation fails, null if valid
     */
    private String validateDelayEntries(List<DelayEntry> delayEntries) {
        if (delayEntries == null) {
            return "Delay entries list is null";
        }
        
        if (delayEntries.isEmpty()) {
            return "No delay entries to process";
        }
        
        StringBuilder errors = new StringBuilder();
        int errorCount = 0;
        
        for (int i = 0; i < delayEntries.size(); i++) {
            DelayEntry entry = delayEntries.get(i);
            
            if (entry == null) {
                errors.append("Entry ").append(i).append(" is null\n");
                errorCount++;
                continue;
            }
            
            if (!entry.isValid()) {
                errors.append("Entry ").append(i).append(" is invalid: ")
                      .append(entry.getStudentId()).append("\n");
                errorCount++;
                continue;
            }
            
            // Additional validation rules
            if (entry.getDelayMinutes() <= 0) {
                errors.append("Entry ").append(i).append(" has invalid delay minutes: ")
                      .append(entry.getDelayMinutes()).append("\n");
                errorCount++;
            }
            
            if (entry.getStudentId() == null || entry.getStudentId().trim().isEmpty()) {
                errors.append("Entry ").append(i).append(" has empty student ID\n");
                errorCount++;
            }
            
            if (entry.getEntryBy() == null || entry.getEntryBy().trim().isEmpty()) {
                errors.append("Entry ").append(i).append(" has empty staff identifier\n");
                errorCount++;
            }
        }
        
        if (errorCount > 0) {
            return "Found " + errorCount + " validation error(s):\n" + errors.toString();
        }
        
        return null;
    }
    
    /**
     * Create JSON payload from delay entries
     * @param delayEntries List of delay entries
     * @return JSON string
     */
    private String createJsonPayload(List<DelayEntry> delayEntries) {
        StringBuilder json = new StringBuilder();
        json.append("{\n");
        json.append("  \"staff\": \"").append(currentStaffName).append("\",\n");
        json.append("  \"timestamp\": \"").append(LocalDateTime.now()).append("\",\n");
        json.append("  \"entries\": [\n");
        
        for (int i = 0; i < delayEntries.size(); i++) {
            DelayEntry entry = delayEntries.get(i);
            json.append("    {\n");
            json.append("      \"studentId\": \"").append(entry.getStudentId()).append("\",\n");
            json.append("      \"studentName\": \"").append(entry.getStudentName()).append("\",\n");
            json.append("      \"className\": \"").append(entry.getClassName()).append("\",\n");
            json.append("      \"delayMinutes\": ").append(entry.getDelayMinutes()).append(",\n");
            json.append("      \"entryTime\": \"").append(entry.getFormattedDateTime()).append("\"\n");
            
            if (i < delayEntries.size() - 1) {
                json.append("    },\n");
            } else {
                json.append("    }\n");
            }
        }
        
        json.append("  ]\n");
        json.append("}");
        
        return json.toString();
    }
    
    /**
     * Create a backup file for data persistence
     * @param delayEntries List of delay entries
     * @param success Whether the operation was successful
     */
    private void createBackupFile(List<DelayEntry> delayEntries, boolean success) {
        try {
            // Create data directory if it doesn't exist
            File dataDir = new File(DATA_DIR);
            if (!dataDir.exists()) {
                dataDir.mkdirs();
            }
            
            // Create filename with timestamp
            String timestamp = LocalDateTime.now().format(
                DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern(BACKUP_FILE_FORMAT));
            String status = success ? "success" : "pending";
            String filename = DATA_DIR + File.separator + 
                             "delay_data_" + timestamp + "_" + status + ".csv";
            
            // Write CSV file
            try (PrintWriter writer = new PrintWriter(new FileWriter(filename))) {
                // Write header
                writer.println("studentId,studentName,delayMinutes,className,entryBy,entryDateTime");
                
                // Write data
                for (DelayEntry entry : delayEntries) {
                    writer.println(entry.toCSVString());
                }
                
                log("Backup file created: " + filename + " (" + delayEntries.size() + " entries)");
                
            } catch (IOException e) {
                log("Error creating backup file: " + e.getMessage());
            }
            
        } catch (Exception e) {
            log("Unexpected error creating backup: " + e.getMessage());
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * Handle SMOS server interruption as per postconditions
     */
    private void handleSMOSServerInterruption() {
        log("SMOS SERVER INTERRUPTION HANDLED");
        
        // In a real implementation, this would:
        // 1. Switch to backup server if available
        // 2. Notify administrators
        // 3. Enable offline mode
        // 4. Schedule retry for pending data
        
        // For now, just log and notify user
        showConnectionError("SMOS server connection interrupted. Working in offline mode.");
        
        // Switch to simulation mode temporarily
        boolean wasSimulation = simulationMode;
        simulationMode = true;
        log("Temporarily switched to simulation mode due to SMOS interruption");
        
        // Try to send pending entries in simulation mode
        if (!pendingEntries.isEmpty()) {
            log("Attempting to process " + pendingEntries.size() + " pending entries in simulation");
            simulateServerSubmission(new ArrayList<>(pendingEntries));
        }
        
        // Restore original mode
        simulationMode = wasSimulation;
    }
    
    /**
     * Show connection error message to user
     * @param message Error message
     */
    private void showConnectionError(String message) {
        // In a real application, this would update the UI status
        // For now, we'll just log it
        log("USER NOTIFICATION: " + message);
        
        // Could show a dialog if running in GUI context
        // JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, message, "Connection Error", JOptionPane.WARNING_MESSAGE);
    }
    
    /**
     * Log operation message
     * @param message Message to log
     */
    private void log(String message) {
        String timestamp = LocalDateTime.now().format(DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("HH:mm:ss"));
        String logMessage = "[" + timestamp + "] " + message;
        operationLog.append(logMessage).append("\n");
        System.out.println(logMessage); // Also print to console for debugging
    }
    
    /**
     * Get the operation log
     * @return String containing all logged operations
     */
    public String getOperationLog() {
        return operationLog.toString();
    }
    
    /**
     * Clear the operation log
     */
    public void clearOperationLog() {
        operationLog = new StringBuilder();
        log("Operation log cleared");
    }
    
    /**
     * Get pending entries count
     * @return Number of pending entries
     */
    public int getPendingEntriesCount() {
        return pendingEntries.size();
    }
    
    /**
     * Get server URL
     * @return Current server URL
     */
    public String getServerUrl() {
        return serverUrl;
    }
    
    /**
     * Set server URL
     * @param serverUrl New server URL
     */
    public void setServerUrl(String serverUrl) {
        this.serverUrl = serverUrl;
        log("Server URL updated to: " + serverUrl);
    }
    
    /**
     * Test server connection
     * @return True if connection test is successful, false otherwise
     */
    public boolean testConnection() {
        if (simulationMode) {
            log("Simulation mode: Connection test skipped");
            return true;
        }
        
        try {
            URL url = new URL(serverUrl);
            HttpURLConnection connection = (HttpURLConnection) url.openConnection();
            connection.setRequestMethod("HEAD");
            connection.setConnectTimeout(5000);
            connection.setReadTimeout(5000);
            
            int responseCode = connection.getResponseCode();
            connection.disconnect();
            
            boolean success = (responseCode == HttpURLConnection.HTTP_OK);
            log("Connection test " + (success ? "SUCCESS" : "FAILED") + " (code: " + responseCode + ")");
            return success;
            
        } catch (Exception e) {
            log("Connection test failed: " + e.getMessage());
            return false;
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * Save operation log to file
     * @return True if successful, false otherwise
     */
    public boolean saveLogToFile() {
        try {
            File dataDir = new File(DATA_DIR);
            if (!dataDir.exists()) {
                dataDir.mkdirs();
            }
            
            String timestamp = LocalDateTime.now().format(
                DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyyMMdd"));
            String filename = DATA_DIR + File.separator
2025-12-28 20:18:07.706 | INFO     | metagpt.roles.di.role_zero:_act:294 - Commands outputs: 
Command Engineer2.write_new_code executed: The file /home///baselines/MetaGPT/workspace/InsertDelayAta_1766923906/DataHandler.java has been successfully created, with content:
I'll create the DataHandler class for server communication. This class should handle sending delay data to a server, with proper error handling, simulation mode for testing, and connection management as mentioned in the postconditions (SMOS server).

```java
import java.util.List;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.io.*;
import java.net.*;
import java.time.LocalDateTime;
import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
import javax.swing.JOptionPane;

/**
 * DataHandler class responsible for server communication.
 * Handles sending delay data to the server with error handling and retry logic.
 * Supports simulation mode for testing without actual server connection.
 */
public class DataHandler {
    // Configuration constants
    private static final String DEFAULT_SERVER_URL = "http://localhost:8080/api/delays";
    private static final int CONNECTION_TIMEOUT = 10000; // 10 seconds
    private static final int READ_TIMEOUT = 15000; // 15 seconds
    private static final int MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS = 3;
    
    // File constants for data persistence
    private static final String DATA_DIR = "ata_delay_data";
    private static final String BACKUP_FILE_FORMAT = "yyyyMMdd_HHmmss";
    
    private String serverUrl;
    private boolean simulationMode;
    private String currentStaffName;
    private List<DelayEntry> pendingEntries;
    
    // Logging and status
    private StringBuilder operationLog;
    
    /**
     * Constructor with default server URL
     * @param staffName Name of the ATA staff using the system
     */
    public DataHandler(String staffName) {
        this(DEFAULT_SERVER_URL, staffName);
    }
    
    /**
     * Constructor with custom server URL
     * @param serverUrl The URL of the server endpoint
     * @param staffName Name of the ATA staff using the system
     */
    public DataHandler(String serverUrl, String staffName) {
        this.serverUrl = serverUrl;
        this.currentStaffName = staffName;
        this.simulationMode = false;
        this.pendingEntries = new ArrayList<>();
        this.operationLog = new StringBuilder();
        
        log("DataHandler initialized for staff: " + staffName);
        log("Server URL: " + serverUrl);
    }
    
    /**
     * Enable or disable simulation mode
     * @param simulationMode True for simulation mode, false for real server communication
     */
    public void setSimulationMode(boolean simulationMode) {
        this.simulationMode = simulationMode;
        log("Simulation mode: " + (simulationMode ? "ENABLED" : "DISABLED"));
    }
    
    /**
     * Send delay data to the server
     * @param delayEntries List of delay entries to send
     * @return True if successful, false otherwise
     */
    public boolean sendDelayData(List<DelayEntry> delayEntries) {
        if (delayEntries == null || delayEntries.isEmpty()) {
            log("No delay entries to send");
            return false;
        }
        
        log("Preparing to send " + delayEntries.size() + " delay entries");
        
        // Validate all entries before sending
        String validationError = validateDelayEntries(delayEntries);
        if (validationError != null) {
            log("Validation failed: " + validationError);
            return false;
        }
        
        // Store pending entries
        pendingEntries = new ArrayList<>(delayEntries);
        
        // Check for simulation mode
        if (simulationMode) {
            return simulateServerSubmission(delayEntries);
        }
        
        // Real server communication
        return sendToServer(delayEntries);
    }
    
    /**
     * Send data to the actual server with retry logic
     * @param delayEntries List of delay entries
     * @return True if successful, false otherwise
     */
    private boolean sendToServer(List<DelayEntry> delayEntries) {
        log("Attempting to connect to server: " + serverUrl);
        
        // Try multiple times in case of connection issues
        for (int attempt = 1; attempt <= MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS; attempt++) {
            try {
                log("Connection attempt " + attempt + " of " + MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS);
                
                // Create HTTP connection
                URL url = new URL(serverUrl);
                HttpURLConnection connection = (HttpURLConnection) url.openConnection();
                
                // Configure connection
                connection.setRequestMethod("POST");
                connection.setRequestProperty("Content-Type", "application/json");
                connection.setRequestProperty("Accept", "application/json");
                connection.setRequestProperty("User-Agent", "ATA-Delay-System/1.0");
                connection.setConnectTimeout(CONNECTION_TIMEOUT);
                connection.setReadTimeout(READ_TIMEOUT);
                connection.setDoOutput(true);
                
                // Create JSON payload
                String jsonPayload = createJsonPayload(delayEntries);
                log("Payload size: " + jsonPayload.length() + " bytes");
                
                // Send data
                try (OutputStream os = connection.getOutputStream()) {
                    byte[] input = jsonPayload.getBytes("utf-8");
                    os.write(input, 0, input.length);
                }
                
                // Get response
                int responseCode = connection.getResponseCode();
                log("Server response code: " + responseCode);
                
                // Read response
                StringBuilder response = new StringBuilder();
                try (BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(
                        new InputStreamReader(connection.getInputStream(), "utf-8"))) {
                    String responseLine;
                    while ((responseLine = br.readLine()) != null) {
                        response.append(responseLine.trim());
                    }
                }
                
                // Handle response
                if (responseCode == HttpURLConnection.HTTP_OK || 
                    responseCode == HttpURLConnection.HTTP_CREATED) {
                    log("Server accepted data successfully");
                    log("Response: " + response.toString());
                    
                    // Clear pending entries on success
                    pendingEntries.clear();
                    createBackupFile(delayEntries, true);
                    return true;
                } else {
                    log("Server rejected data with code: " + responseCode);
                    log("Error response: " + response.toString());
                    
                    // Save to backup file for retry
                    createBackupFile(delayEntries, false);
                    
                    // Wait before retry (exponential backoff)
                    if (attempt < MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS) {
                        int waitTime = 1000 * (int) Math.pow(2, attempt - 1); // 1s, 2s, 4s
                        log("Waiting " + waitTime + "ms before retry...");
                        Thread.sleep(waitTime);
                    }
                }
                
                connection.disconnect();
                
            } catch (SocketTimeoutException e) {
                log("Connection timeout on attempt " + attempt + ": " + e.getMessage());
                createBackupFile(delayEntries, false);
                
                if (attempt == MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS) {
                    log("Max retry attempts reached. Data saved to backup.");
                    showConnectionError("Connection timeout. Data saved locally for later submission.");
                }
                
            } catch (ConnectException e) {
                log("Connection refused on attempt " + attempt + ": " + e.getMessage());
                createBackupFile(delayEntries, false);
                
                if (attempt == MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS) {
                    log("Max retry attempts reached. SMOS server connection interrupted.");
                    showConnectionError("SMOS server connection interrupted. Data saved locally.");
                    
                    // SMOS server interruption as per postconditions
                    handleSMOSServerInterruption();
                }
                
            } catch (IOException e) {
                log("IO error on attempt " + attempt + ": " + e.getMessage());
                createBackupFile(delayEntries, false);
                
                if (attempt == MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS) {
                    log("Max retry attempts reached due to IO error.");
                    showConnectionError("Network error. Please check your connection.");
                }
                
            } catch (Exception e) {
                log("Unexpected error on attempt " + attempt + ": " + e.getMessage());
                e.printStackTrace();
                createBackupFile(delayEntries, false);
                
                if (attempt == MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS) {
                    log("Max retry attempts reached due to unexpected error.");
                    showConnectionError("Unexpected error occurred: " + e.getMessage());
                }
            }
        }
        
        return false;
    }
    
    /**
     * Simulate server submission (for testing without actual server)
     * @param delayEntries List of delay entries
     * @return Always returns true for simulation
     */
    private boolean simulateServerSubmission(List<DelayEntry> delayEntries) {
        log("SIMULATION MODE: Simulating server submission");
        
        try {
            // Simulate network delay
            Thread.sleep(1500);
            
            // Validate in simulation
            String validationError = validateDelayEntries(delayEntries);
            if (validationError != null) {
                log("SIMULATION: Validation failed - " + validationError);
                return false;
            }
            
            // Create backup file even in simulation
            createBackupFile(delayEntries, true);
            
            // Log simulated success
            log("SIMULATION: Successfully submitted " + delayEntries.size() + " entries");
            for (DelayEntry entry : delayEntries) {
                log("SIMULATION: " + entry.getSummary());
            }
            
            // Clear pending entries
            pendingEntries.clear();
            
            return true;
            
        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
            Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
            log("SIMULATION: Interrupted during simulation");
            return false;
        } catch (Exception e) {
            log("SIMULATION: Error during simulation - " + e.getMessage());
            return false;
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * Validate a list of delay entries
     * @param delayEntries List of delay entries to validate
     * @return Error message if validation fails, null if valid
     */
    private String validateDelayEntries(List<DelayEntry> delayEntries) {
        if (delayEntries == null) {
            return "Delay entries list is null";
        }
        
        if (delayEntries.isEmpty()) {
            return "No delay entries to process";
        }
        
        StringBuilder errors = new StringBuilder();
        int errorCount = 0;
        
        for (int i = 0; i < delayEntries.size(); i++) {
            DelayEntry entry = delayEntries.get(i);
            
            if (entry == null) {
                errors.append("Entry ").append(i).append(" is null\n");
                errorCount++;
                continue;
            }
            
            if (!entry.isValid()) {
                errors.append("Entry ").append(i).append(" is invalid: ")
                      .append(entry.getStudentId()).append("\n");
                errorCount++;
                continue;
            }
            
            // Additional validation rules
            if (entry.getDelayMinutes() <= 0) {
                errors.append("Entry ").append(i).append(" has invalid delay minutes: ")
                      .append(entry.getDelayMinutes()).append("\n");
                errorCount++;
            }
            
            if (entry.getStudentId() == null || entry.getStudentId().trim().isEmpty()) {
                errors.append("Entry ").append(i).append(" has empty student ID\n");
                errorCount++;
            }
            
            if (entry.getEntryBy() == null || entry.getEntryBy().trim().isEmpty()) {
                errors.append("Entry ").append(i).append(" has empty staff identifier\n");
                errorCount++;
            }
        }
        
        if (errorCount > 0) {
            return "Found " + errorCount + " validation error(s):\n" + errors.toString();
        }
        
        return null;
    }
    
    /**
     * Create JSON payload from delay entries
     * @param delayEntries List of delay entries
     * @return JSON string
     */
    private String createJsonPayload(List<DelayEntry> delayEntries) {
        StringBuilder json = new StringBuilder();
        json.append("{\n");
        json.append("  \"staff\": \"").append(currentStaffName).append("\",\n");
        json.append("  \"timestamp\": \"").append(LocalDateTime.now()).append("\",\n");
        json.append("  \"entries\": [\n");
        
        for (int i = 0; i < delayEntries.size(); i++) {
            DelayEntry entry = delayEntries.get(i);
            json.append("    {\n");
            json.append("      \"studentId\": \"").append(entry.getStudentId()).append("\",\n");
            json.append("      \"studentName\": \"").append(entry.getStudentName()).append("\",\n");
            json.append("      \"className\": \"").append(entry.getClassName()).append("\",\n");
            json.append("      \"delayMinutes\": ").append(entry.getDelayMinutes()).append(",\n");
            json.append("      \"entryTime\": \"").append(entry.getFormattedDateTime()).append("\"\n");
            
            if (i < delayEntries.size() - 1) {
                json.append("    },\n");
            } else {
                json.append("    }\n");
            }
        }
        
        json.append("  ]\n");
        json.append("}");
        
        return json.toString();
    }
    
    /**
     * Create a backup file for data persistence
     * @param delayEntries List of delay entries
     * @param success Whether the operation was successful
     */
    private void createBackupFile(List<DelayEntry> delayEntries, boolean success) {
        try {
            // Create data directory if it doesn't exist
            File dataDir = new File(DATA_DIR);
            if (!dataDir.exists()) {
                dataDir.mkdirs();
            }
            
            // Create filename with timestamp
            String timestamp = LocalDateTime.now().format(
                DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern(BACKUP_FILE_FORMAT));
            String status = success ? "success" : "pending";
            String filename = DATA_DIR + File.separator + 
                             "delay_data_" + timestamp + "_" + status + ".csv";
            
            // Write CSV file
            try (PrintWriter writer = new PrintWriter(new FileWriter(filename))) {
                // Write header
                writer.println("studentId,studentName,delayMinutes,className,entryBy,entryDateTime");
                
                // Write data
                for (DelayEntry entry : delayEntries) {
                    writer.println(entry.toCSVString());
                }
                
                log("Backup file created: " + filename + " (" + delayEntries.size() + " entries)");
                
            } catch (IOException e) {
                log("Error creating backup file: " + e.getMessage());
            }
            
        } catch (Exception e) {
            log("Unexpected error creating backup: " + e.getMessage());
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * Handle SMOS server interruption as per postconditions
     */
    private void handleSMOSServerInterruption() {
        log("SMOS SERVER INTERRUPTION HANDLED");
        
        // In a real implementation, this would:
        // 1. Switch to backup server if available
        // 2. Notify administrators
        // 3. Enable offline mode
        // 4. Schedule retry for pending data
        
        // For now, just log and notify user
        showConnectionError("SMOS server connection interrupted. Working in offline mode.");
        
        // Switch to simulation mode temporarily
        boolean wasSimulation = simulationMode;
        simulationMode = true;
        log("Temporarily switched to simulation mode due to SMOS interruption");
        
        // Try to send pending entries in simulation mode
        if (!pendingEntries.isEmpty()) {
            log("Attempting to process " + pendingEntries.size() + " pending entries in simulation");
            simulateServerSubmission(new ArrayList<>(pendingEntries));
        }
        
        // Restore original mode
        simulationMode = wasSimulation;
    }
    
    /**
     * Show connection error message to user
     * @param message Error message
     */
    private void showConnectionError(String message) {
        // In a real application, this would update the UI status
        // For now, we'll just log it
        log("USER NOTIFICATION: " + message);
        
        // Could show a dialog if running in GUI context
        // JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, message, "Connection Error", JOptionPane.WARNING_MESSAGE);
    }
    
    /**
     * Log operation message
     * @param message Message to log
     */
    private void log(String message) {
        String timestamp = LocalDateTime.now().format(DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("HH:mm:ss"));
        String logMessage = "[" + timestamp + "] " + message;
        operationLog.append(logMessage).append("\n");
        System.out.println(logMessage); // Also print to console for debugging
    }
    
    /**
     * Get the operation log
     * @return String containing all logged operations
     */
    public String getOperationLog() {
        return operationLog.toString();
    }
    
    /**
     * Clear the operation log
     */
    public void clearOperationLog() {
        operationLog = new StringBuilder();
        log("Operation log cleared");
    }
    
    /**
     * Get pending entries count
     * @return Number of pending entries
     */
    public int getPendingEntriesCount() {
        return pendingEntries.size();
    }
    
    /**
     * Get server URL
     * @return Current server URL
     */
    public String getServerUrl() {
        return serverUrl;
    }
    
    /**
     * Set server URL
     * @param serverUrl New server URL
     */
    public void setServerUrl(String serverUrl) {
        this.serverUrl = serverUrl;
        log("Server URL updated to: " + serverUrl);
    }
    
    /**
     * Test server connection
     * @return True if connection test is successful, false otherwise
     */
    public boolean testConnection() {
        if (simulationMode) {
            log("Simulation mode: Connection test skipped");
            return true;
        }
        
        try {
            URL url = new URL(serverUrl);
            HttpURLConnection connection = (HttpURLConnection) url.openConnection();
            connection.setRequestMethod("HEAD");
            connection.setConnectTimeout(5000);
            connection.setReadTimeout(5000);
            
            int responseCode = connection.getResponseCode();
            connection.disconnect();
            
            boolean success = (responseCode == HttpURLConnection.HTTP_OK);
            log("Connection test " + (success ? "SUCCESS" : "FAILED") + " (code: " + responseCode + ")");
            return success;
            
        } catch (Exception e) {
            log("Connection test failed: " + e.getMessage());
            return false;
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * Save operation log to file
     * @return True if successful, false otherwise
     */
    public boolean saveLogToFile() {
        try {
            File dataDir = new File(DATA_DIR);
            if (!dataDir.exists()) {
                dataDir.mkdirs();
            }
            
            String timestamp = LocalDateTime.now().format(
                DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyyMMdd"));
            String filename = DATA_DIR + File.separator

public String getFormattedDateTime() {\n        return entryDateTime.format(FORMATTER);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Gets the ATA staff who entered the data\n     * @return The staff identifier\n     */\n    public String getEntryBy() {\n        return entryBy;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Sets the ATA staff who entered the data\n     * @param entryBy The new staff identifier\n     */\n    public public static DelayEntry fromCSVString(String csvLine) {\n        String[] parts = csvLine.split(",");\n        if (parts.length < 6) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid CSV format for DelayEntry");\n        }\n        \n        String studentId = parts[0];\n        String studentName = parts[1];\n        int delayMinutes = Integer.parseInt(parts[2]);\n        String             "No delays selected. Please select at least one student with delay.",\n                    "No Delays Selected",\n                    JOptionPane.INFORMATION_MESSAGE);\n                return;\n            }\n (dataHandler != null) {\n                    boolean success = dataHandler.sendDelayData(delayEntries);\n                    \n                    if (success) {\n                        statusLabel.setText("Data sent successfully!");\n                        JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this,\n                            "Delay data has been successfully entered into the system.",\n                            "Success",\n                            JOptionPane.INFORMATION_MESSAGE);\n                        \n                        // Reset form as per postconditions (initial JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this,\n                            "Failed to send data to server. Please try again.",\n                            "Server Error",\n                            JOptionPane.ERROR_MESSAGE);\n                    }\n                } else {\n                    // Simulate success if no data handler is set (for testing)\n                    statusLabel.setText("Data ready (no server connection)");\n                    JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this,\n                        delayEntries.size() + " delay entries collected successfully.\\n" +\n                        "Simulated server submission (DataHandler not configured).",\n                        "Simulation Mode",\n                        JOptionPane.INFORMATION_MESSAGE);\n                    resetForm();\n                }\n            }\n            \n        } catch (Exception ex) {\n            statusLabel.setText("Error: " + ex.getMessage());\n            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this,\n                "An error occurred: " + ex.getMessage(),\n                "Error",\n                JOptionPane.ERROR_MESSAGE);\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Handle Cancel button click\n     */\n    private void handleCancel() {\n        int confirmation = JOptionPane.showConfirmDialog(this,\n            "Are you sure you want to cancel? All unsaved changes will be lost.",\n            "Confirm Cancel",\n            JOptionPane.YES_NO_OPTION,\n            JOptionPane.WARNING_MESSAGE);\n        \n        if (confirmation == JOptionPane.YES_OPTION) {\n            // Close the application as per postconditions\n            dispose();\n            System.exit(0);\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Collect delay entries from the table\n     * @return List of DelayEntry objects\n     */\n    private List<DelayEntry> collectDelayEntries() {\n        List<DelayEntry> entries = new ArrayList<>();\n        \n        for (int i = 0; i < students.size(); i++) {\n            Student student = students.get(i);\n            Boolean hasDelay = (Boolean) tableModel.getValueAt(i, COL_DELAY_CHECKBOX);\n            Object minutesObj = tableModel.getValueAt(i, COL_DELAY_MINUTES);\n            \n            // Convert delay minutes to integer\n            int delayMinutes = 0;\n            if (minutesObj != null) {\n                if (minutesObj instanceof Number) {\n                    delayMinutes = ((Number) minutesObj).intValue();\n                } else if (minutesObj instanceof String) {\n                    try {\n                        delayMinutes = Integer.parseInt(minutesObj.toString());\n                    } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                        delayMinutes = 0;\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n            \n            // Only create entry if delay is checked and minutes > 0\n            if (hasDelay != null && hasDelay && delayMinutes > 0) {\n                DelayEntry entry = new DelayEntry(\n                    student.getStudentId(),\n                    student.getFullName(),\n                    delayMinutes,\n                    currentClass,\n                    ataStaffName\n                );\n                entries.add(entry);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return entries;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Reset the form to initial state\n     */\n    private void resetForm() {\n        // Clear all delay selections\n        for (int i = 0; i < students.size(); i++) {\n - Ready for new entries");\n        studentTable.repaint();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Custom table model for student data\n     */\n    private class StudentTableModel extends AbstractTableModel {\n        private final List<Student> students;\n        private final Class<?>[] columnClasses = {\n            Boolean.class, String.class, String.class, Boolean.class, Integer.class\n        };\n        \n        public StudentTableModel(List<Student> students) {\n            this.students = students;\n        }\n        \n        @Override\n        public int getRowCount() {\n            return students.size();\n        }\n        \n        @Override\n        public int getColumnCount() {\n            return COLUMN_NAMES.length;\n        }\n        \n        @Override\n        public String getColumnName(int column) {\n            return COLUMN_NAMES[column];\n        }\n        \n        @Override\n        public Class<?> getColumnClass(int columnIndex) {\n            return columnClasses[columnIndex];\n        }\n        \n        @Override\n        public boolean isCellEditable(int rowIndex, int columnIndex) {\n            // Only delay checkbox and delay minutes are editable\n            // Delay minutes is only editable when delay is checked (handled elsewhere)\n            return columnIndex == COL_DELAY_CHECKBOX || columnIndex == COL_DELAY_MINUTES;\n        }\n        \n        @Override\n        public Object getValueAt(int rowIndex, int columnIndex) {\n            Student student = students.get(rowIndex);\n            switch (columnIndex) {\n                case 0: // Present\n                    return student.isPresent();\n                case 1: // Student ID\n                    return student.getStudentId();\n                case 2: // Name\n                    return student.getFullName();\n                case 3: // Delay checkbox\n                    return student.hasDelay();\n                case 4: // Delay minutes\n                    return student.getDelayMinutes();\n                default:\n                    return null;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        @Override\n        public void setValueAt(Object aValue, int rowIndex, int columnIndex) {\n            Student student = students.get(rowIndex);\n            switch (columnIndex) {\n                case 0: // Present\n                    student.setPresent((Boolean) aValue);\n                    break;\n                case 3: // Delay checkbox\n                    boolean hasDelay = (Boolean) aValue;\n                    student.setHasDelay(hasDelay);\n                    if (!hasDelay) {\n                        // Auto-clear delay minutes when delay is unchecked\n                        student.setDelayMinutes(0);\n                    }\n                    break;\n                case 4: // Delay minutes\n                    try {\n                        int minutes = 0;\n                        if (aValue != null) {\n                            if (aValue instanceof Number) {\n                                minutes = ((Number) aValue).intValue();\n                            } else if (aValue instanceof String) {\n                                minutes = Integer.parseInt(aValue.toString());\n                            }\n                        }\n                        student.setDelayMinutes(minutes);\n                        // Auto-check delay when minutes are set\n                        if (minutes > 0) {\n                            student.setHasDelay(true);\n                            fireTableCellUpdated(rowIndex, COL_DELAY_CHECKBOX);\n                        }\n                    } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                        // Keep current value if invalid\n                    }\n                    break;\n            }\n            fireTableCellUpdated(rowIndex, columnIndex);\n        }\n    }\n    \n This class should handle sending delay data to a server, with proper error handling, simulation mode for testing, and connection management as mentioned in the postconditions (SMOS server).\n\n```java\nimport java.util.List;\nimport java.util.ArrayList;\nimport java.io.*;\nimport java.net.*;\nimport java.time.LocalDateTime;\nimport java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;\nimport javax.swing.JOptionPane;\n\n/**\n * DataHandler class responsible for server communication.\n * Handles sending delay data to the server with error handling and retry logic.\n * Supports simulation mode for testing without actual server connection.\n */\npublic class DataHandler {\n    // Configuration constants\n    private static final String DEFAULT_SERVER_URL = "http://localhost:8080/api/delays";\n    private static final int CONNECTION_TIMEOUT = 10000; // 10 seconds\n    private static final int READ_TIMEOUT = 15000; // 15 seconds\n    private static final int MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS = 3;\n    \n    // File constants for data persistence\n    private static final String DATA_DIR = "ata_delay_data";\n    private static final String BACKUP_FILE_FORMAT = "yyyyMMdd_HHmmss";\n    \n    private String serverUrl;\n    private boolean simulationMode;\n    private String currentStaffName;\n    private List<DelayEntry> pendingEntries;\n    \n    // Logging and status\n    private StringBuilder operationLog;\n    \n    /**\n     * Constructor with default server URL\n     * @param staffName Name of the ATA staff using the system\n     */\n    public DataHandler(String staffName) {\n        this(DEFAULT_SERVER_URL, staffName);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Constructor with custom server URL\n     * @param serverUrl The URL of the server endpoint\n     * @param staffName Name of the ATA staff using the system\n     */\n    public DataHandler(String serverUrl, String staffName) {\n        this.serverUrl = serverUrl;\n        this.currentStaffName = staffName;\n        this.simulationMode = false;\n        this.pendingEntries = new ArrayList<>();\n        this.operationLog = new StringBuilder();\n        \n        log("DataHandler initialized for staff: " + staffName);\n        log("Server URL: " + serverUrl);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Enable or disable simulation mode\n     * @param simulationMode True for simulation mode, false for real server communication\n     */\n    public void setSimulationMode(boolean simulationMode) {\n        this.simulationMode = simulationMode;\n        log("Simulation mode: " + (simulationMode ? "ENABLED" : "DISABLED"));\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Send delay data to the server\n     * @param delayEntries List of delay entries to send\n     * @return True if successful, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean sendDelayData(List<DelayEntry> delayEntries) {\n        if (delayEntries == null || delayEntries.isEmpty()) {\n            log("No delay entries to send");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        log("Preparing to send " + delayEntries.size() + " delay entries");\n        \n        // Validate all entries before sending\n        String validationError = validateDelayEntries(delayEntries);\n        if (validationError != null) {\n            log("Validation failed: " + validationError);\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Store pending entries\n        pendingEntries = new ArrayList<>(delayEntries);\n        \n        // Check for simulation mode\n        if (simulationMode) {\n            return simulateServerSubmission(delayEntries);\n        }\n        \n        // Real server communication\n        return sendToServer(delayEntries);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Send data to the actual server with retry logic\n     * @param delayEntries List of delay entries\n     * @return True if successful, false otherwise\n     */\n    private boolean sendToServer(List<DelayEntry> delayEntries) {\n        log("Attempting to connect to server: " + serverUrl);\n        \n        // Try multiple times in case of connection issues\n        for (int attempt = 1; attempt <= MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS; attempt++) {\n            try {\n                log("Connection attempt " + attempt + " of " + MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS);\n                \n                // Create HTTP connection\n                URL url = new URL(serverUrl);\n                HttpURLConnection connection = (HttpURLConnection) url.openConnection();\n                \n                // Configure connection\n                connection.setRequestMethod("POST");\n                connection.setRequestProperty("Content-Type", "application/json");\n                connection.setRequestProperty("Accept", "application/json");\n                connection.setRequestProperty("User-Agent", "ATA-Delay-System/1.0");\n                connection.setConnectTimeout(CONNECTION_TIMEOUT);\n                connection.setReadTimeout(READ_TIMEOUT);\n                connection.setDoOutput(true);\n                \n                // Create JSON payload\n                String jsonPayload = createJsonPayload(delayEntries);\n                log("Payload size: " + jsonPayload.length() + " bytes");\n                \n                // Send data\n                try (OutputStream os = connection.getOutputStream()) {\n                    byte[] input = jsonPayload.getBytes("utf-8");\n                    os.write(input, 0, input.length);\n                }\n                \n                // Get response\n                int responseCode = connection.getResponseCode();\n                log("Server response code: " + responseCode);\n                \n                // Read response\n                StringBuilder response = new StringBuilder();\n                try (BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(\n                        new InputStreamReader(connection.getInputStream(), "utf-8"))) {\n                    String responseLine;\n                    while ((responseLine = br.readLine()) != null) {\n                        response.append(responseLine.trim());\n                    }\n                }\n                \n                // Handle response\n                if (responseCode == HttpURLConnection.HTTP_OK || \n                    responseCode == HttpURLConnection.HTTP_CREATED) {\n                    log("Server accepted data successfully");\n                    log("Response: " + response.toString());\n                    \n                    // Clear pending entries on success\n                    pendingEntries.clear();\n                    createBackupFile(delayEntries, true);\n                    return true;\n                } else {\n                    log("Server rejected data with code: " + responseCode);\n                    log("Error response: " + response.toString());\n                    \n                    // Save to backup file for retry\n                    createBackupFile(delayEntries, false);\n                    \n                    // Wait before retry (exponential backoff)\n                    if (attempt < MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS) {\n                        int waitTime = 1000 * (int) Math.pow(2, attempt - 1); // 1s, 2s, 4s\n                        log("Waiting " + waitTime + "ms before retry...");\n                        Thread.sleep(waitTime);\n                    }\n                }\n                \n                connection.disconnect();\n                \n            } catch (SocketTimeoutException e) {\n                log("Connection timeout on attempt " + attempt + ": " + e.getMessage());\n                createBackupFile(delayEntries, false);\n                \n                if (attempt == MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS) {\n                    log("Max retry attempts reached. Data saved to backup.");\n                    showConnectionError("Connection timeout. Data saved locally for later submission.");\n                }\n                \n            } catch (ConnectException e) {\n                log("Connection refused on attempt " + attempt + ": " + e.getMessage());\n                createBackupFile(delayEntries, false);\n                \n                if (attempt == MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS) {\n                    log("Max retry attempts reached. SMOS server connection interrupted.");\n                    showConnectionError("SMOS server connection interrupted. Data saved locally.");\n                    \n                    // SMOS server interruption as per postconditions\n                    handleSMOSServerInterruption();\n                }\n                \n            } catch (IOException e) {\n                log("IO error on attempt " + attempt + ": " + e.getMessage());\n                createBackupFile(delayEntries, false);\n                \n                if (attempt == MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS) {\n                    log("Max retry attempts reached due to IO error.");\n                    showConnectionError("Network error. Please check your connection.");\n                }\n                \n            } catch (Exception e) {\n                log("Unexpected error on attempt " + attempt + ": " + e.getMessage());\n                e.printStackTrace();\n                createBackupFile(delayEntries, false);\n                \n                if (attempt == MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS) {\n                    log("Max retry attempts reached due to unexpected error.");\n                    showConnectionError("Unexpected error occurred: " + e.getMessage());\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Simulate server submission (for testing without actual server)\n     * @param delayEntries List of delay entries\n     * @return Always returns true for simulation\n     */\n    private boolean simulateServerSubmission(List<DelayEntry> delayEntries) {\n        log("SIMULATION MODE: Simulating server submission");\n        \n        try {\n            // Simulate network delay\n            Thread.sleep(1500);\n            \n            // Validate in simulation\n            String validationError = validateDelayEntries(delayEntries);\n            if (validationError != null) {\n                log("SIMULATION: Validation failed - " + validationError);\n                return false;\n            }\n            \n            // Create backup file even in simulation\n            createBackupFile(delayEntries, true);\n            \n            // Log simulated success\n            log("SIMULATION: Successfully submitted " + delayEntries.size() + " entries");\n            for (DelayEntry entry : delayEntries) {\n                log("SIMULATION: " + entry.getSummary());\n            }\n            \n            // Clear pending entries\n            pendingEntries.clear();\n            \n            return true;\n            \n        } catch (InterruptedException e) {\n            Thread.currentThread().interrupt();\n            log("SIMULATION: Interrupted during simulation");\n            return false;\n        } catch (Exception e) {\n            log("SIMULATION: Error during simulation - " + e.getMessage());\n            return false;\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Validate a list of delay entries\n     * @param delayEntries List of delay entries to validate\n     * @return Error message if validation fails, null if valid\n     */\n    private String validateDelayEntries(List<DelayEntry> delayEntries) {\n        if (delayEntries == null) {\n            return "Delay entries list is null";\n        }\n        \n        if (delayEntries.isEmpty()) {\n            return "No delay entries to process";\n        }\n        \n        StringBuilder errors = new StringBuilder();\n        int errorCount = 0;\n        \n        for (int i = 0; i < delayEntries.size(); i++) {\n            DelayEntry entry = delayEntries.get(i);\n            \n            if (entry == null) {\n                errors.append("Entry ").append(i).append(" is null\\n");\n                errorCount++;\n                continue;\n            }\n            \n            if (!entry.isValid()) {\n                errors.append("Entry ").append(i).append(" is invalid: ")\n                      .append(entry.getStudentId()).append("\\n");\n                errorCount++;\n                continue;\n            }\n            \n            // Additional validation rules\n            if (entry.getDelayMinutes() <= 0) {\n                errors.append("Entry ").append(i).append(" has invalid delay minutes: ")\n                      .append(entry.getDelayMinutes()).append("\\n");\n                errorCount++;\n            }\n            \n            if (entry.getStudentId() == null || entry.getStudentId().trim().isEmpty()) {\n                errors.append("Entry ").append(i).append(" has empty student ID\\n");\n                errorCount++;\n            }\n            \n            if (entry.getEntryBy() == null || entry.getEntryBy().trim().isEmpty()) {\n                errors.append("Entry ").append(i).append(" has empty staff identifier\\n");\n                errorCount++;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        if (errorCount > 0) {\n            return "Found " + errorCount + " validation error(s):\\n" + errors.toString();\n        }\n        \n        return null;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Create JSON payload from delay entries\n     * @param delayEntries List of delay entries\n     * @return JSON string\n     */\n    private String createJsonPayload(List<DelayEntry> delayEntries) {\n        StringBuilder json = new StringBuilder();\n        json.append("{\\n");\n        json.append("  \\"staff\\": \\"").append(currentStaffName).append("\\",\\n");\n        json.append("  \\"timestamp\\": \\"").append(LocalDateTime.now()).append("\\",\\n");\n        json.append("  \\"entries\\": [\\n");\n        \n        for (int i = 0; i < delayEntries.size(); i++) {\n            DelayEntry entry = delayEntries.get(i);\n            json.append("    {\\n");\n            json.append("      \\"studentId\\": \\"").append(entry.getStudentId()).append("\\",\\n");\n            json.append("      \\"studentName\\": \\"").append(entry.getStudentName()).append("\\",\\n");\n            json.append("      \\"className\\": \\"").append(entry.getClassName()).append("\\",\\n");\n            json.append("      \\"delayMinutes\\": ").append(entry.getDelayMinutes()).append(",\\n");\n            json.append("      \\"entryTime\\": \\"").append(entry.getFormattedDateTime()).append("\\"\\n");\n            \n            if (i < delayEntries.size() - 1) {\n                json.append("    },\\n");\n            } else {\n                json.append("    }\\n");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        json.append("  ]\\n");\n        json.append("}");\n        \n        return json.toString();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Create a backup file for data persistence\n     * @param delayEntries List of delay entries\n     * @param success Whether the operation was successful\n     */\n    private void createBackupFile(List<DelayEntry> delayEntries, boolean success) {\n        try {\n            // Create data directory if it doesn\'t exist\n            File dataDir = new File(DATA_DIR);\n            if (!dataDir.exists()) {\n                dataDir.mkdirs();\n            }\n            \n            // Create filename with timestamp\n            String timestamp = LocalDateTime.now().format(\n                DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern(BACKUP_FILE_FORMAT));\n            String status = success ? "success" : "pending";\n            String filename = DATA_DIR + File.separator + \n                             "delay_data_" + timestamp + "_" + status + ".csv";\n            \n            // Write CSV file\n            try (PrintWriter writer = new PrintWriter(new FileWriter(filename))) {\n                // Write header\n                writer.println("studentId,studentName,delayMinutes,className,entryBy,entryDateTime");\n                \n                // Write data\n                for (DelayEntry entry : delayEntries) {\n                    writer.println(entry.toCSVString());\n                }\n                \n                log("Backup file created: " + filename + " (" + delayEntries.size() + " entries)");\n                \n            } catch (IOException e) {\n                log("Error creating backup file: " + e.getMessage());\n            }\n            \n        } catch (Exception e) {\n            log("Unexpected error creating backup: " + e.getMessage());\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Handle SMOS server interruption as per postconditions\n     */\n    private void handleSMOSServerInterruption() {\n        log("SMOS SERVER INTERRUPTION HANDLED");\n        \n        // In a real implementation, this would:\n        // 1. Switch to backup server if available\n        // 2. Notify administrators\n        // 3. Enable offline mode\n        // 4. Schedule retry for pending data\n        \n        // For now, just log and notify user\n        showConnectionError("SMOS server connection interrupted. Working in offline mode.");\n        \n        // Switch to simulation mode temporarily\n        boolean wasSimulation = simulationMode;\n        simulationMode = true;\n        log("Temporarily switched to simulation mode due to SMOS interruption");\n        \n        // Try to send pending entries in simulation mode\n        if (!pendingEntries.isEmpty()) {\n            log("Attempting to process " + pendingEntries.size() + " pending entries in simulation");\n            simulateServerSubmission(new ArrayList<>(pendingEntries));\n        }\n        \n        // Restore original mode\n        simulationMode = wasSimulation;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Show connection error message to user\n     * @param message Error message\n     */\n    private void showConnectionError(String message) {\n        // In a real application, this would update the UI status\n        // For now, we\'ll just log it\n        log("USER NOTIFICATION: " + message);\n        \n        // Could show a dialog if running in GUI context\n        // JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, message, "Connection Error", JOptionPane.WARNING_MESSAGE);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Log operation message\n     * @param message Message to log\n     */\n    private void log(String message) {\n        String timestamp = LocalDateTime.now().format(DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("HH:mm:ss"));\n        String logMessage = "[" + timestamp + "] " + message;\n        operationLog.append(logMessage).append("\\n");\n        System.out.println(logMessage); // Also print to console for debugging\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get the operation log\n     * @return String containing all logged operations\n     */\n    public String getOperationLog() {\n        return operationLog.toString();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Clear the operation log\n     */\n    public void clearOperationLog() {\n        operationLog = new StringBuilder();\n        log("Operation log cleared");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get pending entries count\n     * @return Number of pending entries\n     */\n    public int getPendingEntriesCount() {\n        return pendingEntries.size();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Get server URL\n     * @return Current server URL\n     */\n    public String getServerUrl() {\n        return serverUrl;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Set server URL\n     * @param serverUrl New server URL\n     */\n    public void setServerUrl(String serverUrl) {\n        this.serverUrl = serverUrl;\n        log("Server URL updated to: " + serverUrl);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Test server connection\n     * @return True if connection test is successful, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean testConnection() {\n        if (simulationMode) {\n            log("Simulation mode: Connection test skipped");\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        try {\n            URL url = new URL(serverUrl);\n            HttpURLConnection connection = (HttpURLConnection) url.openConnection();\n            connection.setRequestMethod("HEAD");\n            connection.setConnectTimeout(5000);\n            connection.setReadTimeout(5000);\n            \n            int responseCode = connection.getResponseCode();\n            connection.disconnect();\n            \n            boolean success = (responseCode == HttpURLConnection.HTTP_OK);\n            log("Connection test " + (success ? "SUCCESS" : "FAILED") + " (code: " + responseCode + ")");\n            return success;\n            \n        } catch (Exception e) {\n            log("Connection test failed: " + e.getMessage());\n            return false;\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Save operation log to file\n     * @return True if successful, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean saveLogToFile() {\n        try {\n            File dataDir = new File(DATA_DIR);\n            if (!dataDir.exists()) {\n                dataDir.mkdirs();\n            }\n            \n            String timestamp = LocalDateTime.now().format(\n                DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyyMMdd"));\n            String filename = DATA_DIR + File.separator\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. format for DelayEntry");\n        }\n        \n        String studentId = parts[0];\n        String studentName = parts[1];\n        int delayMinutes = Integer.parseInt(parts[2]);\n        String * Shows a screen with all students present and allows ATA staff to \n * mark delays and specify delay times.\n */\npublic class InsertDelayAtaGUI extends JFrame implements ActionListener {\n    // GUI * @param className The name of the class being viewed\n     * @param ataStaffName The name of the logged-in ATA staff\n     * @param students List of students in the class\n     */\n    public InsertDelayAtaGUI(String className, String ataStaffName, List<Student> students) {\n        this.currentClass = className;\n        this.ataStaffName = ataStaffName;\n        this.students = new ArrayList<>(students);\n        \n        // Initialize GUI\n        initComponents();\n        setupLayout();\n        configureFrame();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Initialize GUI components\n     */\n    private void initComponents() {\n        // Title label\n        titleLabel = new JLabel("Insert Delay - " + currentClass);\n        titleLabel.setFont(new Font("Arial", Font.BOLD, 16));\n        titleLabel.setHorizontalAlignment(SwingConstants.CENTER);\n        \n        // Create table model and table\n        tableModel = new StudentTableModel(students);\n        studentTable = new JTable(tableModel);\n        \n        // Configure table\n        studentTable.setRowHeight(25);\n        studentTable.getColumnModel().getColumn(0).setPreferredWidth(60);  // Present\n        studentTable.getColumnModel().getColumn(1).setPreferredWidth(100); // Student ID\n        studentTable.getColumnModel().getColumn(2).setPreferredWidth(150); // Name\n        studentTable.getColumnModel().getColumn(3).setPreferredWidth(60);  // Delay checkbox\n        studentTable.getColumnModel().getColumn(4).setPreferredWidth(100); // Delay minutes\n        \n        // Make the delay minutes column editable only when delay is checked\n        studentTable.getModel().addTableModelListener(new TableModelListener() {\n            @Override\n            public void tableChanged(TableModelEvent e) {\n                if (e.getColumn() == COL_DELAY_CHECKBOX) {\n                    int row = e.getFirstRow();\n                    boolean hasDelay = (Boolean) tableModel.getValueAt(row, COL_DELAY_CHECKBOX);\n                    tableModel.fireTableCellUpdated(row, COL_DELAY_MINUTES);\n                    \n                    // Enable/disable delay minutes editing\n                    if (!hasDelay) {\n                        // Clear delay minutes when delay is unchecked\n                        tableModel.setValueAt(0, row, COL_DELAY_MINUTES);\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n        });\n        \n        // Make delay minutes column use a spinner editor\n        JSpinner hourSpinner = new JSpinner(new SpinnerNumberModel(0, 0, 23, 1));\n        JSpinner minuteSpinner = new JSpinner(new SpinnerNumberModel(0, 0, 59, 5));\n        \n        // Create a custom editor for delay minutes\n        studentTable.getColumnModel().getColumn(COL_DELAY_MINUTES).setCellEditor(new DefaultCellEditor(\n                new JTextField() {\n                    @Override\n                    public void setText(String t) {\n                        super.setText(t);\n                    }\n                }\n        ));\n        \n        // Buttons\n        confirmButton = new JButton("Confirm");\n        confirmButton.addActionListener(this);\n        confirmButton.setBackground(new Color(76, 175, 80));\n        confirmButton.setForeground(Color.WHITE);\n        confirmButton.setFont(new Font("Arial", Font.BOLD, 14));\n        \n        cancelButton = new JButton("Cancel");\n        cancelButton.addActionListener(this);\n        cancelButton.setBackground(new Color(244, 67, 54));\n        cancelButton.setForeground(Color.WHITE);\n        cancelButton.setFont(new Font("Arial", Font.BOLD, 14));\n        \n        // Status label\n        statusLabel = new JLabel("Ready - Logged in
